document_title: What are pitted scars? Causes, signs and classification
subsection_content:
Have! With today's modern medicine, treating pitted scars is not too difficult. However, the effectiveness of treatment depends on the condition of pitted scars. In addition, patients need to go to reputable pitted scar treatment facilities, examine and correctly assess the condition, choose the appropriate method, post-treatment care, etc.
Treating old pitted scars will take more time and be more difficult to achieve effectiveness than new scars.
